title: List of all Android viewpager  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android viewpager  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: ViewPagerIndicator
repoList.description: Paging indicator widgets compatible with the ViewPager from the Android Support Library and ActionBarSherlock.

repoList.name: ViewPagerTransforms
repoList.description: Library containing common animations needed for transforming ViewPager scrolling for Android v13+.

repoList.name: MaterialViewPager
repoList.description: A Material Design ViewPager easy to use library

repoList.name: freepager
repoList.description: ViewPagers library for Android

repoList.name: InfiniteCycleViewPager
repoList.description: Infinite cycle ViewPager with two-way orientation and interactive effect.

repoList.name: Android-DirectionalViewPager
repoList.description: [DEPRECATED] Implementation of the compatibility library ViewPager class that supports paging both vertically and horizontally.

repoList.name: ViewPager-Android
repoList.description: Based on the Android support library's ViewPager class, this ViewPager supports both horizontal and vertical paging views.

repoList.name: DragSlopLayout
repoList.description: A UI library for Android

repoList.name: FlippableStackView
repoList.description: An Android library introducing a stack of Views with the first item being flippable.

repoList.name: ViewPagerAnimator
repoList.description: A lightweight, yet powerful ViewPager animation library for Android

repoList.description: Paging indicator widgets compatible with the ViewPager from the Android Support Library and ActionBarSherlock.
